title: Senate Tracker: A Race To Fill A Seat In Iowa
teaser: As longtime Sen. Tom Harkin retires, Republican State Sen. Joni Ernst and Democratic Congressman Bruce Braley are vying for the seat.
contentencoded:
In this week’s installment of Senate Tracker, we turn to Iowa, where longtime Democratic Senator Tom Harkin is retiring from his seat. Vying for the seat are Republican State Sen. Joni Ernst and Democratic Congressman Bruce Braley.

  • See more in our Senate Tracker series

Guest

  • Clay Masters, reporter and local Morning Edition host at Iowa Public Radio. He tweets @Clay_Masters.
